descriptionSet.description: Few nurses were identified in the Army Signal Corps photos of nursing units. The Vanderbilt Unit included doctors and local nurses from Davidson County. Head Nurse Catherine Sinnot had worked for St. Thomas Hospital and was awarded the Distinguished Service Medal for her "splendid leadership, tireless energy, and unselfish devotion."
